title: Did you play "Living and leaving Death" as a tourism tramp without a COVID-19 mask?
subtitle: According to the CDC, everyone should put some kind of protection on their noses and mouths in public places where it is difficult to maintain distance between others.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: During the Corona 19 virus epidemic, US President Donald Trump visited an industrial factory without wearing a face mask. The delivery of the N'Roses rifle to "live and leave death" played on loudspeakers during his visit.
